name: Weatherapp
shortDescription: Weatherapp is a simple weather forecast app, which uses some APIs to fetch 5 day / 3 hour forecast data from the OpenWeatherMap and to fetch places,cities,counties,coords etc. from Algolia Places.
longDescription: Weatherapp is a simple weather forecast app, which uses some APIs to fetch 5 day / 3 hour forecast data from the OpenWeatherMap and to fetch places,cities,counties,coords etc. from Algolia Places.
